scripts.generate:auth: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/authentication.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/auth
scripts.generate:accounts: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/accounts.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/accounts
scripts.generate:events: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/events.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/events
scripts.generate:reviews: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/reviews.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/reviews
scripts.generate:invites: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/invites.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/invites
scripts.generate:invite-settings: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/invites-settings.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/invite-settings
scripts.generate:event-types: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/events-types.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/event-types
scripts.generate:templates: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/openapi/templates.public.yaml --config openapi-config.yaml -o src/generated/templates
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:auth && npm run generate:accounts && npm run generate:events && npm run generate:reviews && npm run generate:invites && npm run generate:invite-settings && npm run generate:event-types && npm run generate:questionnaire-links && npm run generate:reviews-aggregation-metadata && npm run generate:templates
